schoolName: Pacific Career and Technology High School
description:
Being a small learning community at Pacific High allows us to provide a quality education and differentiate all students’ personal and educational needs.
 
Caring staff, strongly committed to student success
Multiple credit recovery options
Smaller class sizes and data-driven lesson plans
Individualized scheduling, designed to help each student gain pride and ownership of their school achievement
Childcare for students with children (infant - 3 years) at Pacific Infant & Toddler
Child Care Center on site
Continuation school competitive athletic program
